title: Slow cooker cannellini bean and cabbage soup
ingredients: ['1.5L vegetable or chicken stock', '1 bay leaf', '4 tablespoons dry white wine', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh rosemary', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme', '1 onion, chopped', '1 small cabbage, shredded', '2 (400g) tins cannellini beans, drained', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
